about_the_game:
The Game

ARC TCG is a 3D fantasy card game. Build your deck and challenge other players in battles full of surprises. Play smart and crush your opponents with powerful abilities. This game is inspired by more successful TCG titles, but adapted to offer new gameplay strategies.

Combat system

The semi-automatic component means that the player can focus exclusively on when and how they can play one or more cards. Creatures on the battlefield will attack automatically, however, the many abilities the game offers can turn the fate of combat around.

Card Abilities

Each creature has a default set of abilities up to a maximum of 4 per creature. Each ability is unique and always offers new strategies, and combining certain abilities also makes it possible to create powerful combos.

Heroes

Each Hero has a specific ability, activated only 1 time per turn and under certain conditions. Take advantage of their characteristics with the available cards to increase your chances of victory

Factions

Play with 3 different factions:

  • Humans

  • Nature

  • Dimensional

Each faction brings with it a unique abilities set, heroes, and cards, offering new game strategies

Game modes

Singleplayer:

  • Relaxed: play without worrying about scores or leaderboards. Test to your decks and try pre-built ones.

  • Standard: play with your decks by challenging different levels of AI, gain experience and rewards

  • Draft: play by choosing a random pair of cards from the two proposed until you build your deck

  • Ranked: play against AI, win games, climb the rankings and earn rewards at the end of the season

Multiplayer:

  • Private: play vs another player in a private match, test your decks or play with pre-built ones

  • Standard: play vs another player in public match, win rewards based on opponent "strenght"

  • League: play against another player and climb the leaderboard, advance in rank and get new rewards

In addition, the game in its current state offers:

  • 3 playable Factions

  • +300 unique cards

  • +50 unique abilities

  • +15 Heroes

  • 9 pre-built decks

  • Deck Editor: Create/Edit your decks and share them with the community!

  • Progression System

  • Online Services

  • Ranked matches

  • Singleplayer Seasons

  • Sound Effects

  • High Quality graphics

  • Multiplayer
